vistra.app.control.state

Class AbstractSbsState

  • java.lang.Object
    • vistra.framework.util.AbstractState
      • vistra.app.control.state.AbstractSbsState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SbsAtBeginning, SbsAtEnd, SbsInter, SbsOff

    abstract class AbstractSbsState
extends AbstractState
implements IState
    An abstract step-by-step state.

    Roland Bruggmann (brugr9@bfh.ch)
